long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the  Picture-in-Picture-With Playback controls (PiP) extension for seamless video playback, optimized for YouTube. This extension allows you to watch videos in a floating mini player that stays on top of other windows, ensuring you never miss a moment while multitasking or browsing the web.

With just a click, the selected YouTube video pops out into a fully functional mini player, complete with all the original playback controls like play/pause, rewind, and fast forward. Customize the floating window to your likingâ€”resize it to fit your screen and position it anywhere you need.


Key Features:

Advanced Playback Controls: Enjoy the same controls as the original YouTube player, including play, pause, rewind, and fast forward, all within the floating window.

Customizable Floating Window: Resize the PiP window to your preferred size and place it anywhere on your screen for convenient viewing.

Hotkey Support: Easily control your video playback with keyboard shortcuts, making multitasking even more efficient.

Always on Top: Keep the video window on top of other applications and websites, allowing you to watch while you work, browse, or review other content.

Designed specifically for YouTube, this Picture-in-Picture extension ensures a smooth and uninterrupted viewing experience, making it the best choice for watching videos while staying productive.
